# AtlasPro AI Marketing Website - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
Next.js 14+ marketing website for AtlasPro AI - a spatial intelligence platform that makes the physical world machine-readable.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14+ (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Framer Motion
- Google Fonts: Space Grotesk (headings), Inter (body)

## Brand Guidelines
**Color Palette:**
- Main: #11231F
- Secondary: #4A9888
- Off-white green text: #B5D2CE
- Deep: #112836
- Accent glow: #6FE7D8
- Warning/Highlight: #F2C572
- Border/Divider: rgba(181,210,206,0.18)

**Design Principles:**
- Premium, calm, futuristic, enterprise-grade aesthetic
- Big whitespace, large rounded cards (16–24px radius)
- Glassy overlays, soft shadows, thin borders
- Subtle gradients and animations
- Mobile-first responsive design
- 8px spacing grid

## Site Structure
- Home (Hero, Features, Pipeline, Use Cases, Trust/Security, Testimonials, CTA)
- Product (Detailed capabilities, Platform modules, Dashboard mock)
- Use Cases (Filterable by industry)
- About (Mission, Values)
- Contact/Request Demo (Form)

## Animation Requirements
- Topographic contour lines or particle field in hero background
- Gentle fade + upward motion on scroll
- Interactive pipeline diagram with animated flow lines
- Subtle scan sweep animation (~8-12s interval)
- Light parallax effects
- Micro-interactions (hover lift, glow, underline slide)

## Development Guidelines
- Use semantic HTML and accessible components
- Keep components modular and reusable
- Optimize for performance (minimal heavy assets)
- Write production-ready, well-commented code
- No lorem ipsum - use real, compelling copy
